I18N.Title: MCI
I18N.Translation: The 'Music CD Identifier' frame is intended for music that comes from a CD, so that the CD can be identified in databases such as the CDDB [CDDB]. The frame consists of a binary dump of the Table Of Contents, TOC, from the CD, which is a header of 4 bytes and then 8 bytes/track on the CD making a maximum of 804 bytes. This frame requires a present and valid "TRK" frame. There may only be one "MCI" frame in each tag.
